commit.message:
Add nLocalServices info to RPC getinfo

Also show full 64 bits of services. Previously service bits >32 that
were advertised just didn't show up at all.

Add comment regarding experimental-use service bits

As per mailing list discussion.

verification.payload:
tree d443719ea8bdb20313cabcc5bc1dc218e66d4c88
parent 99ddc6cb706e825e54da244a10d4d6389fc5eaae
author Peter Todd <pete@petertodd.org> 1403355924 -0400
committer Peter Todd <pete@petertodd.org> 1403365403 -0400

Add comment regarding experimental-use service bits

As per mailing list discussion.

files.patch:
@@ -64,6 +64,14 @@ class CMessageHeader
 enum
 {
     NODE_NETWORK = (1 << 0),
+
+    // Bits 24-31 are reserved for temporary experiments. Just pick a bit that
+    // isn't getting used, or one not being used much, and notify the
+    // bitcoin-development mailing list. Remember that service bits are just
+    // unauthenticated advertisements, so your code must be robust against
+    // collisions and other cases where nodes may be advertising a service they
+    // do not actually support. Other service bits should be allocated via the
+    // BIP process.
 };
 
 /** A CService with information about it as peer */
